metadata.title: They worked at the Department of
tags: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science (WMiI)

page_content:
*Departments*.
*Chair of Algebra and Geometry (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/katedra-algebry-i-geometrii)*director: prof. dr. hab. Piotr Dowbor
*Chair of Functional Analysis (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/katedra-analizy-funkcjonalnej)*director: prof. dr. hab. Oleksandr Gomilko
*Department of Computer Science (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/katedra-informatyki)*director: Prof. Piotr Wisniewski, Ph.D., UMK.
*Department of Combinatorics and Symbolic Computing*director: Andrzej Mroz, Ph.D., UMK prof.
*Department of Nonlinear Mathematical Analysis*director: Grzegorz Gabor, Ph.D., UMK prof.
*Differential Equations Chair (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/katedra-rownan-rozniczkowych)*director: prof. dr. hab. Slawomir Rybicki
*Department of Mathematical Statistics and Data Mining*director: Aleksander Zaigraev, Ph.D., UMK prof.
*Department of Ergodic Theory and Dynamical Systems*director: Joanna Kulaga-Przymus, Ph.D., UMK prof.
*Department of Probability Theory and Stochastic Analysis*director: Prof. Andrzej Rozkosz, PhD.

*Workshops*.
*Electronics and Computer Measurement Laboratory*director: Dr. Jakub Narębski.
*The Computer Science Teaching Methodology Laboratory*manager: Dr. Anna Beata Kwiatkowska.
*Workroom for Methodology of Teaching Mathematics*manager: Dr. Agnieszka Krause
* *Operating Systems Laboratory (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/pracownia-systemow-operacyjnych)*manager: Zbigniew Szewczak, Ph.D., UMK professor.
* *Network Systems Laboratory (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/pracownia-systemow-sieciowych)*manager: Dr. Piotr Przymus.
*Mobile Technologies Laboratory (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/struktura/pracownia-technologii-mobilnych)*manager: Błażej Zyglarski, Ph.

*Laboratories*.
*Laboratory for Computer System Exploitation*director: Jakub Przybysz, Eng.
